title: Aftermath

knows: 22 colonies shut down ansible, 19 maintain operation, 6 in civil war
Ansible traffic down 47% but not eliminated
Guild preparing trial: unauthorized access, theft, incitement, conspiracy, crimes against humanity
Ryn suspended, charged as co-conspirator, accepting responsibility
Alternate modeling: Scenario Alpha would have killed 31B (or 43B if FTL failed)
Only 62% ansible destruction achieved, not 70% target
Ryn wants to meet in 12 hours
Lira Voss.emotional_state: Crushed by weight of casualties. Killed more in 2 days than guild in 40 years. Questioning if truth was worth it. Watching herself become the monster she fought. Accepting responsibility while drowning in it. Waiting to learn if choice was catastrophic mistake or necessary evil.

revealed_to_reader: 8-10M dead in 48 hours from truth exposure
Trial coming for crimes against humanity
chapter_purpose: Show immediate catastrophic aftermath. Lira wrestling with responsibility for millions dead. Self-doubt about choice. Setup for final meeting with Ryn and Chapter 19 escape.
